TopicTitle: Ascending/descending nodes disappear after deleting maneuver node

Articles.Content: I haven't reproduced this deliberately yet, but have observed the ascending and descending node lines and icons disappearing from the map view after deleting a maneuver node placed at the DN, making very difficult to plan a new plane-matching maneuver.  If this is not an already-understood issue, please reply and I'll see if I can get some more debug info and logs.  Thanks!
